00055 /*
00056  * This implementation was written based on information provided by the
00057  * following documents:
00058  *
00059  * NFC Forum Type 2 Tag Operation
00060  *  Technical Specification
00061  *  NFCForum-TS-Type-2-Tag_1.0 - 2007-07-09
00062  *
00063  * ISO/IEC 14443-3
00064  *  First edition - 2001-02-01
00065  *  Identification cards — Contactless integrated circuit(s) cards — Proximity cards
00066  *  Part 3: Initialization and anticollision
00067  */
00068 
00069 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00070 #  include "config.h"
00071 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00072 
00073 #include <errno.h>
00074 #include <signal.h>
00075 #include <stdlib.h>
00076 
00077 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00078 #include <nfc/nfc-emulation.h>
00079 
00080 #include "utils/nfc-utils.h"
00081 
00082 static nfc_device *pnd;
00083 static nfc_context *context;
00084 
00085 static void
00086 stop_emulation(int sig)
00087 {
00088   (void)sig;
00089   if (pnd != NULL) {
00090     nfc_abort_command(pnd);
00091   } else {
00092     nfc_exit(context);
00093     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00094   }
00095 }
00096 
00097 static uint8_t __nfcforum_tag2_memory_area[] = {
00098   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,  // Block 0
00099   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,
00100   0x00, 0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF,  // Block 2 (Static lock bytes: CC area and data area are read-only locked)
00101   0xE1, 0x10, 0x06, 0x0F,  // Block 3 (CC - NFC-Forum Tag Type 2 version 1.0, Data area (from block 4 to the end) is 48 bytes, Read-only mode)
00102 
00103   0x03, 33,   0xd1, 0x02,  // Block 4 (NDEF)
00104   0x1c, 0x53, 0x70, 0x91,
00105   0x01, 0x09, 0x54, 0x02,
00106   0x65, 0x6e, 0x4c, 0x69,
00107 
00108   0x62, 0x6e, 0x66, 0x63,
00109   0x51, 0x01, 0x0b, 0x55,
00110   0x03, 0x6c, 0x69, 0x62,
00111   0x6e, 0x66, 0x63, 0x2e,
00112 
00113   0x6f, 0x72, 0x67, 0x00,
00114   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,
00115   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,
00116   0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00,
00117 };
00118 
00119 #define READ    0x30
00120 #define WRITE     0xA2
00121 #define SECTOR_SELECT   0xC2
00122 
00123 #define HALT    0x50
00124 static int
00125 nfcforum_tag2_io(struct nfc_emulator *emulator, const uint8_t *data_in, const size_t data_in_len, uint8_t *data_out, const size_t data_out_len)
00126 {
00127   int res = 0;
00128 
00129   uint8_t *nfcforum_tag2_memory_area = (uint8_t *)(emulator->user_data);
00130 
00131   printf("    In: ");
00132   print_hex(data_in, data_in_len);
00133 
00134   switch (data_in[0]) {
00135     case READ:
00136       if (data_out_len >= 16) {
00137         memcpy(data_out, nfcforum_tag2_memory_area + (data_in[1] * 4), 16);
00138         res = 16;
00139       } else {
00140         res = -ENOSPC;
00141       }
00142       break;
00143     case HALT:
00144       printf("HALT sent\n");
00145       res = -ECONNABORTED;
00146       break;
00147     default:
00148       printf("Unknown command: 0x%02x\n", data_in[0]);
00149       res = -ENOTSUP;
00150   }
00151 
00152   if (res < 0) {
00153     ERR("%s (%d)", strerror(-res), -res);
00154   } else {
00155     printf("    Out: ");
00156     print_hex(data_out, res);
00157   }
00158 
00159   return res;
00160 }
00161 
00162 int
00163 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00164 {
00165   (void)argc;
00166   (void)argv;
00167 
00168   nfc_target nt = {
00169     .nm = {
00170       .nmt = NMT_ISO14443A,
00171       .nbr = NBR_UNDEFINED, // Will be updated by nfc_target_init()
00172     },
00173     .nti = {
00174       .nai = {
00175         .abtAtqa = { 0x00, 0x04 },
00176         .abtUid = { 0x08, 0x00, 0xb0, 0x0b },
00177         .szUidLen = 4,
00178         .btSak = 0x00,
00179         .szAtsLen = 0,
00180       },
00181     }
00182   };
00183 
00184   struct nfc_emulation_state_machine state_machine = {
00185     .io = nfcforum_tag2_io
00186   };
00187 
00188   struct nfc_emulator emulator = {
00189     .target = &nt,
00190     .state_machine = &state_machine,
00191     .user_data = __nfcforum_tag2_memory_area,
00192   };
00193 
00194   signal(SIGINT, stop_emulation);
00195 
00196   nfc_init(&context);
00197   if (context == NULL) {
00198     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)");
00199     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00200   }
00201   pnd = nfc_open(context, NULL);
00202 
00203   if (pnd == NULL) {
00204     ERR("Unable to open NFC device");
00205     nfc_exit(context);
00206     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00207   }
00208 
00209   printf("NFC device: %s opened\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd));
00210   printf("Emulating NDEF tag now, please touch it with a second NFC device\n");
00211 
00212   if (nfc_emulate_target(pnd, &emulator, 0) < 0) {
00213     nfc_perror(pnd, argv[0]);
00214     nfc_close(pnd);
00215     nfc_exit(context);
00216     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00217   }
00218 
00219   nfc_close(pnd);
00220   nfc_exit(context);
00221   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00222 }
